meanings.definition: The act of appointing someone to a position again.
meanings.sent1: After his term ended, the mayor's reappointments surprised many.
meanings.sent2: The reappointments of the committee members were announced yesterday.
meanings.sent3: The reappointments caused a stir in the community.
meanings.sent4: Her reappointments breathed new life into the organization.
meanings.sent5: The reappointments brought stability to the team.

meanings.definition: The process of assigning a person to a job or role for a second time.
meanings.sent1: The reappointments of the staff led to improved performance.
meanings.sent2: We are currently discussing the reappointments for next year.
meanings.sent3: His reappointments always come with a celebratory cake.
meanings.sent4: The reappointments felt like a reunion of old friends.
meanings.sent5: The reappointments highlighted the team's dedication.
